title: 'Disrespectful' Salah comments threw club under bus - Rooney
subtitle: Wayne Rooney says the critical comments made by Mohamed Salah after Liverpool's 3-3 draw with Leeds were "disrespectful" and have thrown the club "under the bus".
full_text: Wayne Rooney says the critical comments made by Mohamed Salah after Liverpool's 3-3 draw with Leeds were "disrespectful" and have thrown the club "under the bus".
